title: Have you ever read The Little Prince (Le Petit Prince)? - Quora

response.answer_text: I see Quora still collapses short answers. I’ve read the book in French, English, and Hebrew, and I’ve seen two movies based on it. The Lerner & Loewe musical film didn’t quite work; I understand Frank Sinatra pulled out of the production, and I think he would have made a better stranded pilot than Richard Kiley. Kiley is a wonderful actor and singer, but just a little too hearty. The 2015 animated version does work, at least on its own terms, but it builds a whole big frame story around the book, leaves out too much of the original text, and devotes too much attention to the swoopy-doopy climax that it seems no 3D movie can do without. The Little Prince is a short, short book. If you haven’t read it, you should just read it instead of inquiring about it.
I have and I didn’t get it. I closed the book with a feeling of meh. Maybe some day I will re-read it.
